verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] , in response to current tensions with high - profile athletes over issues like [V: kneeling] [ARGM-PRP: for the national anthem] , has made an offer to the NFL players amid their protests .
President Trump , in response to current tensions with high - profile athletes over issues like kneeling for the national anthem , [V: has] made an offer to the NFL players amid their protests .

[ARG0: President Trump] , [ARGM-CAU: in response to current tensions with high - profile athletes over issues like kneeling for the national anthem] , has [V: made] [ARG1: an offer] [ARG2: to the NFL players] [ARGM-LOC: amid their protests] .
